name: peppermint

text: Perhaps Spongebath doesn't move around at all, and Beef is not nearly as sweaty as Teodor because he was guarding Spongebath.

text: Or, seeing as Spongebath is on a rascal and exerts little physical movement, I believe he was moving around the most. Perhaps some aftermarket parts would get it to such speed and maneuverability that Teodor would have to step up his game and end up in his current state?

text: Spongebath is a fucking animal on the court. The dude is raw.

text: Well he's technically an animal no matter where he is.

text: As are we all, friend.  As are we all.

name: bixschmix
text: From chiblains to murderball. Spinynorman, I think I may love you.

name: spinynorman
text: Well, your like of Yeungling recommends well. I've never had it, I think they only recently began importing it to Texas, which is where I'm at...

name: pogo
text: Seen it.  Great flick.

name: dovey
text: Lots of people in wheel-chairs play basketball.

name: apparentlypants
text: With a roomba vac under each foot.

name: flynn
text: Pat is still a long way off from his magical realism self. Will we ever see him recklessly wield a rope of sausages in assless chaps? Probably if Rod Huggins has anything to say about it.

name: chaesar
text: Yeah. "E-mail me if you ever feel like doing something besides enjoying yourself" How damn Pat is that?

name: bigtom
text: Pat is still a dick

text: well i guess i know i'll never be emailing pat!

name: epicurus
text: Does anyone ever feel like doing something besides enjoying themselves? Think about it, now.

name: agika
text: Holy crap, Epicurus, that's profound. Anyone who says that they aren't thinking of enjoying themselves is lying.

name: tellumo
text: Considering your namesake , it's not surprising you'd post something like that. :-)

name: epicurus
text:
Congratulations Tellumo, you are my...
equation of the week!

name: slalvation
text: A comment left by slalvation was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, HolyQ, Audhumla)

name: terribleman
text: I often feel more like [i]enjoying another[i], but enjoying myself is something I basically always feel like doing.

name: terribleman
text: Fuck you, BBcode. Fuck you TO HELL!

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Teodor sweats like a sponge in a microwave oven.

name: catachresis
text: He is like me. I hate the dude-sweats.

name: epicurus
text: Likewise. It is a problem in wrestling and a blessing for making whale music.

name: connellingus
text: At least it should make you harder to hold down in wrestling.

name: epicurus
text: And sex.

name: numberkillinger
text: if you have to be "held down" i think there is another word for it.

name: epicurus
text: Football?

name: terribleman
text: At least it's not runnin'.

name: behka
text: ray has a great 'waiting stance'.  very similiar to the time the gang went to germany and ray forgot his key in the room and ended up standin outside the fast food joint all day.

name: kickstart
text: Ooh, good call.  I knew I recognized that pose from somewhere.  Thanks Behka!

name: fattypneumonia
text:
I dig Ray's pose in panel 2: the leaning on one arm which is behind his back, the upward pointing eyebrows, the sheepish expression, sucking soda through a straw which is slightly off-center. Onstad conveys so much through seemingly insignificant details like posture.

Ray looks like a little kid outside his parents' room, listening in on an argument he was not meant to overhear.

name: agika
text: They were out of there so fast when Pat opened the door.

name: william
text: Alt Text: And, from the chrysalis, emerged...the caterpillar. [SFX - the sharp, short bleat of a cornet]

name: centipede_damascus
text: And just like the rest of his life, Pat totally asses up being gay.

name: shakey
text: asses up being gay? did you really say that?

name: centipede_damascus
text: Yes, that is a thing that I said.

name: afkpuz
text:
First strip I ever saw.

Kind of a confusing introduction to Achewood.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Teodor is completely out of shape.

name: steerpike66
text:
Oh. God. This is exactly why I can't feel all that total Pride brotherhood shit with every other queer in the world. The dreary ones. The ones who talk about faith and how you can be 'Queer in Christ. The boring child-rearing suburban lesboes. The corporate tarts. And Pat.

Pat.

Pat.

name: semiquaver
text:
Yeah, but there's a balance, you know. I can't stand the Pats of this world, but pride parades bother me just as much, because I crave being able to marry and have a family and live in a regular neighborhood and send my kids to school without being looked down on. It's not a bad thing to want to be liked and accepted by most people. People talk about politically-aware gays like they've somehow sold out to the mainstream, but we really just want to live our lives in peace.

Coming at homosexuality from Pat's self-righteous perspective is swinging way too far in the other direction, and it is totally assholish. I do acknowledge it.

name: nicolae
text: Can gays really not rent cars in Alabama?  Seriously, this intrigues me.

name: endoftheworld
text:
A car rental is a sacred promise endorsed by our Lord and the Visa corporation, not to be sullied by your faggotrocious abomination behavior.

Also you probably can't rent a Prius in Alabama either.

name: steerpike66
text: Of course they can't. Have you SEEN the rental cars in Alabama; not a single little two seater jeep available. It's an infringement, I tells yer!

name: cailetshadow
text: Such an interesting moment, the space in-between frames where Pat almost, almost, lets go of being a cynical bastard, and then decides to keep holding on.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
from an asshole to a chrysalis to an asshole

Is there some Oriental graphic for this?

text: To Pat, being gay is not simply about entering a world where the only activity that exists is tasting people's hogs.
